data.name: CreateAccrualInstructions
CreateAccrualSuspension

ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (TYPE = @type)

data.name: ReadLegalActionDetail
data.value: select top(1) LGA_IDENTIFIER, LA_DETAIL_NO, DETAIL_TYPE from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_DTL where (LGA_IDENTIFIER = @lgaIdentifier) and (LA_DETAIL_NO = @laDetailNo)

data.name: ReadLegalActionPerson1
data.value: select top(1) LA_PERSON_ID, CSP_NUMBER, LGA_IDENTIFIER, LGA_R_IDENTIFIER, LAD_R_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_TYPE from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS where (@ladRNumber = LAD_R_NUMBER) and (@lgaRIdentifier = LGA_R_IDENTIFIER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'S')

data.name: ReadLegalActionPerson2
data.value: select top(1) LA_PERSON_ID, CSP_NUMBER, LGA_IDENTIFIER, LGA_R_IDENTIFIER, LAD_R_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_TYPE from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS where (LAD_R_NUMBER = @ladRNumber) and (LGA_R_IDENTIFIER = @lgaRIdentifier) and (ACCOUNT_TYPE = @accountType)

data.name: ReadLegalActionPerson3
data.value: select top(1) LA_PERSON_ID, CSP_NUMBER, LGA_IDENTIFIER, LGA_R_IDENTIFIER, LAD_R_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_TYPE from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS where (LGA_IDENTIFIER = @lgaIdentifier) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION where (OB_ID = @obId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType)
